thread.title: Excellent hotel in a great location...
thread.title_full: Excellent hotel in a great location... - Review of Hotel La Tamise - Esprit de France, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: kenyoo70
title: Excellent hotel in a great location...
text: Excellent experience at Hotel La Tamise. Definitely felt welcome coming in thanks to Julian. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Anwar was a joy to meet and we will miss his positive energy and exuberance. Felt like a home away from home. Thank you Hotel La Tamise for a memorable and pleasant stay in Paris. We will definitely come back.
